data.query: SELECT PCODE, GYEAR, TEAM, HRA, GAMENUM, AB, RUN, HIT, H2, H3, HR, TB, RBI, SB, CS, SH, SF, BB, HP, KK, GD, ERR, SCORE, WPA, WAR, ISOP, BABIP, OBP, SLG, PA_FLAG, WRC_PLUS, WOBA, OPS FROM baseball.battotal WHERE PCODE = '{HITTER}'

SELECT GMKEY, GDAY, TB, NAME, PCODE, TURN, ONETURN, PA, AB, RBI, RUN, HIT, H2, H3, HR, SB, CS, SH, SF, BB, IB, HP, KK, GD, ERR, LOB, SCORE FROM minor_baseball.hitter WHERE PCODE = '{HITTER}' ORDER BY gday DESC {LIMIT}

SELECT PCODE, GYEAR, TEAM, HRA, GAMENUM, AB, RUN, HIT, H2, H3, HR, TB, RBI, SB, CS, SH, SF, BB, HP, KK, GD, ERR, SCORE, WPA, WAR, ISOP, BABIP, OBP, SLG, PA_FLAG, WRC_PLUS, WOBA, OPS FROM minor_baseball.battotal WHERE PCODE = '{HITTER}' {GYEAR}
